Awesome all around, visual are good, environment is excellent, game play is very satisfying when you finally figure out that one piece of the puzzle that has had your brain ready to ooze out of your ears for like 15 minutes straight. Easily a 9.5/10 would highly recommend

Genauso wie Portal 2007, Nur  viel viel Mehr *-*
speed run style
This is a fun game which is a good brain exercise. Also it has an interesting and fun storyline.
A-Mazing, great story line with lots of puzzles! Also, fun multiplayer!
Good with friends, but better on your own.

Amazing game, just to list some of the things it did right: Gameplay, one of the most fun games you can get today. Graphics, this was released in 2014, but looks like it is brand new, and it doesn't even need a bulky PC, Story, outstanding. comedy, also outstanding, amazing jokes and bits. Music, pretty good. Personally I think this should be the game of the decade. The perfect sequel, complete with co-op.

Portal 2 has been my dream game for over 5 years now, it‚Äôs humour is excellent, the way the game feels in excellent. The story it tells is breath-taking, even after the 3rd or 4th playthrough. It has so much replay ability, 10/10 game for me. It truly takes the cake for me.
